definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
safe and sound (idiom)/to come out unscathed (e.g. from an accident or illness)

sentences.english: Through many dangers, toils, and snares I have already come.
sentences.chinese: 许多危险，试练网罗，我已安然经过。

sentences.english: No lives were lost, and we could wade ashore in safety.
sentences.chinese: 人都安然无恙，我们都能平安地涉水上岸。

sentences.english: Bow and sword and battle I will abolish from the land, so that all may lie down in safety.
sentences.chinese: 又必在国中折断弓刀，止息争战，使他们安然躺卧。

sentences.english: But whoso hearkeneth unto me shall dwell safely, and shall be quiet from fear of evil.
sentences.chinese: 惟有听从我的，必安然居住，得享安静，不怕灾祸。

sentences.english: He ran behind the wall anxiously, but Peter was all right.
sentences.chinese: 他急忙跑到那堵墙后面，发现彼得安然无恙。

sentences.english: Your consignment of 30c/s textiles arrived in good condition.
sentences.chinese: 贵公司寄售之30箱纺织品已安然抵达。

sentences.english: Rather than the cattle rustlers, the villagers are being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 村民们正遭受袭击，偷牛贼却能安然无事。

sentences.english: In this way the wealth of the universe may be securely invested.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样，宇宙的财富才会安然投资到我们身上。

sentences.english: We marvel(l)ed that they had escaped unhurt.
sentences.chinese: 我们感到惊奇的是他们竟安然无恙地逃了出来。
2001年安然公司根据第十一章申请破产保护。

sentences.english: She served a year in jail for her role in a fraudulent Enron tax return.
sentences.chinese: 她因为安然税收欺诈案被判入狱1年。

sentences.english: Thanks to their father's rescue, they could return home safe.
sentences.chinese: 幸获父亲援救，他们才得以安然回家。

sentences.english: Only become the world creator could look on the world peacefully.
sentences.chinese: 做世界的创造者，才会安然地看待万物。

sentences.english: As long as the user is clicking and buying, all is well.
sentences.chinese: 只要用户点击广告，购买商品，一切都会安然无恙。

sentences.english: Sometimes at midnight when sudden moment wake up from any bad dream or any, Listen music-think definitely can sleep again (sound sleep).
sentences.chinese: 当夜半忽因恶梦惊醒，听这个音乐就可安然入睡。

sentences.english: Enron forwarded a copy of that letter to petitioner .
sentences.chinese: 安然转寄了一份该信函的复印件给上诉人。

definition: at ease/to feel relieved/to set one's mind at rest/to keep one's mind on sth
quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
bear hardship with equanimity/regard wrongdoing with equanimity
